relationships.description: J.P. Morgan providing investment analysis and recommendations on global markets
Japanese government under PM Abe implementing fiscal easing policies

analysis.purpose: To provide J.P. Morgan's investment outlook and recommendations for global asset allocation across various markets
analysis.significance: Regular market analysis email from J.P. Morgan providing investment strategy recommendations to clients

notable_quotes: The growth gap between East and West is widening, and has allowed us to join the Obama Pivot towards Asia.
We believe new PM Abe conviction and political power to reflate the economy are real. It has already helped the yen lose 10% versus the dollar.
The recent FOMC minutes, however, have since raised the risk of an early end to QE, reducing to need to hedge through gold.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion found. This is a standard financial market analysis email.

illegal_activity.description: No illegal activity discussed. This is legitimate financial market analysis from J.P. Morgan.

public_knowledge.context: Standard financial market analysis that would be routinely distributed to J.P. Morgan clients and likely similar to publicly available market commentary

analysis.summary: J.P. Morgan's weekly market analysis email providing investment recommendations across global asset classes, with a focus on going long Asian equities (particularly Japan and EM Asia) while being underweight US equities, and discussing various market trends including equity fund inflows, currency movements, and commodity positions.
